it.polimi.isw2019.network.rmi

Class NetworkHandlerRmi

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.isw2019.utilities.Observable<MoveMessage>
      • it.polimi.isw2019.network.rmi.NetworkHandlerRmi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientInterface, NetworkHandlerVisitorInterface, Observer<PlayerMove>, java.rmi.Remote

    public class NetworkHandlerRmi
extends Observable<MoveMessage>
implements Observer<PlayerMove>, ClientInterface, java.rmi.Remote, NetworkHandlerVisitorInterface
